    • Hi, I'm Mark

    My life into the engaging future
    Search results

    I am a computer science major at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, New York.

    In between my studies, you will find me either passionately coding to create new projects, contributing to open source or taking adventurous walks throughout historic Troy.

    Please drop by my website to check out everything that has been taking up most of my time, or email me if you have any inquiries.

    I am seeking summer internship opportunities as a software engineer.
